mapper.select: select p.PERM_NAME from L_PERMISSION p left join L_ROLE_PERMISSION rp ON p.id = rp.PERMISSION_ID left join L_ROLE r ON rp.ROLE_ID = r.id left join L_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.ROLE_ID =r.id where ur.USER_ID = #{id}
select DISTINCT p.* from L_PERMISSION p,L_ROLE_PERMISSION rp where rp.permission_id = p.id and rp.role_id in (select r.id from L_USER_ROLE ur,L_ROLE r where ur.role_id = r.id and ur.user_id = #{id} )
